info.name: Crutox API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Crutox application - Mining Game API

request.description: User login endpoint. Returns user data and auth_token.
User registration endpoint.
Alias for signup endpoint.
Request OTP for password reset. Sends 6-digit OTP to email.
Alias for OTP request endpoint.
Verify OTP code sent to email.
Verify OTP and set new password. reason can be 'get' (verify only) or 'set' (verify and set password).
Change password with old password verification.
Trigger password reset flow (sends OTP).
Update OTP for email. GET request with query parameters.
Get user statistics including mining sessions and referrals.
Update user profile information.
Alias for update_profile endpoint.
Update user profile picture URL.
Get user's referral team members.
Get user's current level information.
Get user's earned badges.
Check and update user levels based on achievements.

body.raw:
{
    "email": "user@example.com",
    "password": "11221122",
    "home": true,
    "mining": true,
    "wallet": true,
    "badges": true,
    "level": true,
    "teamProfile": true,
    "news": true,
    "shop": true,
    "userProfile": true
}

request.description: Update user guide completion status for various sections.
Update user's last active time (ping endpoint).
Set or update username for the user.
Set invite code (referrer ID or username) for the user.
Request account deletion. Sets account status to pending_deletion.
Reactivate a deactivated account.
Start mining session. reason can be 'get' (check status) or 'start' (start mining). coins is the number of coins to use for mining.
Claim coins. reason can be 'get' (check status) or 'start' (claim coin).
Claim bonus rewards.
Get bonus claim history.
Claim tokens from social media task. ID is the social_media_setting ID.
Get list of social media tasks with claim status.
Start a task. task_type can be 'daily' or 'onetime'. Returns reward_available_at timestamp.
Claim reward for a completed task. task_type can be 'daily' or 'onetime'.
Track task interaction. action can be 'started', 'completed', 'claimed', etc.
Check if user is eligible for KYC submission (requires 14 mining sessions and 10 referrals).
Submit KYC documents. Images should be base64 encoded. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD. Automatically verifies with Didit API.
Alias for kyc_submit endpoint.
Get current KYC submission status.
Get KYC progress information.
Get paginated list of news articles with like status.
Alias for get_all_news endpoint.
Like or unlike a news article.
Track news view (alias for like_news).
Get paginated list of shop items/giftcards with view status.
Record shop item view.
Track giftcard interaction. action can be 'viewed', 'clicked', 'purchased', etc.
Get paginated list of giveaways.
Get active booster status for user.
Activate a booster (2x multiplier for 1 hour).
Watch ad to progress toward opening mystery box. box_type can be 'common', 'rare', 'epic', or 'legendary'.
Track mystery box click interaction.
Open mystery box and claim reward coins.
Get available spin wheel prizes.
Claim spin wheel reward.
Get user's spin wheel information and settings.
Get all system settings.
Get currency exchange rates.
Get total user count statistics.
Get server time and timestamp.
Get advertisement settings (AppLovin SDK keys, ad unit IDs, etc.).
Send push notification via OneSignal to a specific user.
Admin login endpoint.
Get all news articles for admin.
Create a new news article.
Update a news article by ID.
Delete a news article by ID.
Get all tasks. Query parameter: type (daily/onetime/all).
Create a new task.
Update a task by ID.
Delete a task by ID.
Get all shop items.
Create a new shop item.
Update a shop item by ID.
Delete a shop item by ID.
Get all giveaways.
Create a new giveaway.
Update a giveaway by ID.
Delete a giveaway by ID.
Get all system settings.
Update system settings.
Get overall coin speed settings.
Update overall coin speed multiplier.
Search and get users with pagination.
Give coins to a user. user_identifier can be email or user ID.
Give a booster to a user.
Get user statistics.
Update user statistics (mining sessions, referrals).
Get user's custom coin speed.
Update user's custom coin speed multiplier.
Get all KYC submissions with optional status filter and pagination.
Update KYC submission status (approved/rejected/pending).
Reset user's mystery box progress. box_type can be 'common', 'rare', 'epic', 'legendary', or 'all'.
Update user statistics (mining sessions and referrals).
